Package controller

Class TicketPriceController

java.lang.Object
controller.TicketPriceController
public class TicketPriceController extends Object
This class represents the Controller for Ticket Pricing It handles all database functions related to System Settings database file

      showTimeId - Ticket's cinema show time
      Returns:
      Ticket with its updated details

      cinemaShowTime - The ticket's cinema show time

      public static double getDayPrice(Ticket ticket, CinemaShowTime cinemaShowTime)

      Parameters:

      cinemaShowTime - The cinema Show time to check the date and time of the Movie

      public static boolean isHoliday(CinemaShowTime cinemaShowTime)
      Check whether the CinemaShowTime is on a holiday
      Parameters:
      cinemaShowTime - Ticket's cinema show time
      Returns:
      true if it is holiday false otherwise

    • setTicketType

      public static void setTicketType(Ticket ticket, MovieGoer movieGoer)
      Set the Ticket Type , according to the values in the text file checking MovieGoer age if more than 55 of age, is a Senior if less than 21 of age, is a Student Standard otherwise update the Ticket price
      Parameters:
      ticket - The ticket to be updated
      movieGoer - The ticket belonging to the Movie Goer

      Returns:
      whether the ticket is eligible
